service2 module

service2.add_good(good)[source]

this function adds a good to the inventory table in the database

Parameters:

good – the good to be added to the inventory table

Raises:

sqlite3.IntegrityError – if the good already exists

this function creates the inventory table in the database

Returns:

connection to the database

Return type:

conn

service2.deduct_good(name)[source]

this function deducts a good from the inventory table in the database

Parameters:

name (str) – the name of the good to be deducted

Returns:

a message indicating the status of the deduction

Return type:

message

service2.delete_good(name)[source]

this function deletes a good from the inventory table in the database

Parameters:

name (str) – the name of the good to be deleted

Returns:

a message indicating the status of the deletion

Return type:

message

service2.get_good_by_name(name)[source]

this function retrieves a good from the inventory table in the database

Parameters:

name (str) – the name of the good to be retrieved

Returns:

the good retrieved from the inventory table

Return type:

good

service2.update_good(good)[source]

this function updates a good in the inventory table in the database

Parameters:

good – the good to be updated in the inventory table

Returns:

the good that has been updated

Return type:

updated_good
